author: husted
msg: Tweak the build.xml "compile.tests" target to represent  that Digester depends on BeanUtils and Collections also being present.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update sample properties file for beanutils and collections libraries.

author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate ChainServlet to package org.apache.commons.chain.web, since it
will be useful in portlet and JavaServer Faces environments as well.
Add ChainListener as an alternative configuration mechanism for
Servlet 2.3 or later systems (it takes advantage of the getResourcePaths()
method on ServletContext to scan all JAR files in "/WEB-INF/lib" for
Tweak the build.xml conditionals to correctly represent the fact that
Digester depends on BeanUtils and Collections also being present.
